name: Halloween Preparations
description:
When I was a kid at three years old I once heard a knock on my window at Halloween. Turns out it was a couple of older kids with masks trying to scare whoever was inside. I of course got terrified, thinking it was real monsters. This happened three years in a row, and ever since then I cannot sleep without something covering the windows.

This game was made to represent the fear I felt every time I walked close to a window during Halloween, and the relief of when I pulled down the blinds to finally be able to go to sleep. The final text tells you that you are forever cursed, and that is a reference to me not being able to sleep anymore without covered windows

Post Mortem:
http://www.victorweidar.com/2017/09/30/halloween-preparations-post-mortem/

Controls
WASD - Walk
Mouse - Look
Left Mouse Button - Interact
